name: Drive City: Car Driving
description:
Are you ready for the city driving 3d?! Here we bring you the best of city car driving 2018 game. Surely not! Let's press the metal pedal and do not take your feet off unless you touch the blazing speed of a high speed car drift. So be ready for this wonderful car driving simulator through different beautiful adorably environments.

*** Game Features ***
Amazing and challenging game play
Stunning graphics and HD environment
Customize different car wash vehicles
Camera view and attractive user interface
Smooth controls and top notch sound
Put your driving controls to experience
Tilt steering & brakes pedal or button controls
Become an expert Car Driver
User friendly & easy to play
Free to download
